scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint

keybindings.when: (editorLangId == Juvix || editorLangId == JuvixCore || editorLangId == JuvixGeb)  && editorTextFocus

editor/title.when: juvix-mode:ready && (editorLangId == Juvix || editorLangId == JuvixCore || editorLangId == JuvixGeb)

juvix-mode.juvixBinName.description: Name of the executable of Juvix. (e.g. juvix-v0.3.0)

juvix-mode.juvixBinPath.description: Absolute path where the Juvix binary is located (e.g. /usr/local/bin/)

juvix-mode.vampirBinName.description: Name of the executable of VampIR. (e.g. vamp-ir)

juvix-mode.vampirBinPath.description: Absolute path to the VampIR executable. (e.g. /usr/local/bin/)

juvix-mode.gebBinName.description: Name of the executable of geb. (e.g. geb)

juvix-mode.gebBinPath.description: Absolute path to the Geb executable. (e.g. /usr/local/bin/)

juvix-mode.opts.description: Common options for the Juvix CLI.

internalBuildDir.description: Directory for compiler internal output. Empty string will make the compiler use a temporary directory.

judocDir.description: Directory for html output. Empty string will make the compiler use a temporary directory.

showNameIds.description: Show the unique number of each identifier when pretty printing

onlyErrors.description: Only print errors in a uniform format

noPositivity.description: Disable positivity checking for inductive types

noStdlib.description: Do not use the standard library

juvix-mode.input.customTranslations.markdownDescription: Add additional input Unicode translations. Example: `{"foo": "‚ò∫"}` will correct `\foo` to `‚ò∫`.

juvix-mode.input.languages.markdownDescription: Enable Unicode input in other file types.

items.description: the name of a language, e.g. 'haskell', 'markdown'

juvix-mode.input.leader.markdownDescription: Leader key to trigger input mode.

juvix-mode.input.eagerReplacementEnabled.markdownDescription: Enable eager replacement of abbreviations that uniquely identify a symbol.

juvix-mode.enableDevTasks.markdownDescription: Create on save views for debugging purposes.

items.description: Internal commands that run on save. Juvix executable is passed as $juvix, the filename as $filename.
